name: The Inn at Kew Gardens (Kew Gardens Hotel)

reviews.text: Stylish and clean rooms - and the pub downstairs is good for pub and a drink.
reviews.title: Nice rooms, lovely pub but noisy air conditioning units outside.

reviews.text: There was too much noise from the air conditioning units outside which meant we didn't get much sleep - so I would recommend choosing your room carefully.
reviews.title: Punter rather than guest...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The "hotel reception" is at the end of the bar and it can be a little frustrating getting service or seen there.
reviews.title: Fantastic place!

reviews.text: Overall a nice place to stay if your in the Kew area.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel in a nice neighborhood...

reviews.text: I really like The Inn. I live about 10-12 minutes walk away, and while there are closer pubs if I'm going for a pint I would invariably choose The Inn. It has almost all the factors of being a top pub: good atmosphere, friendly staff, nice setting, wide variety of seating and a decent food menu.
reviews.title: Friendly staff and convenient to rail station

reviews.text: Don't bother going...- it should be a great pub, ran an interesting beer festival last weekend with good beers, Morris dancers, BBQ etc. that everyone in the local area enjoyed....
reviews.title: Great local - ruined by basic mistakes

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However...all of that good will is completely ruined by announcing with 24 hours notice that it would be closed on Friday evening - when most locals turn up, especially those that were attracted by the previous weekends event.
reviews.title: overpriced, badly furnished rooms.

reviews.text: They are currently running a promotion entitled "we love our locals" - no you don't - you might make a couple of extra grand having a private party on a Friday night but the goodwill you have lost by closing on a Friday evening will easily cancel this.
reviews.title: We loved this hotel and would definitely recommend it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For Gods sake, could the Botanist or the Greyhound please step up and provide an alternative to give them competition.
reviews.title: Pleasant little Inn

reviews.text: The price quoted on the phone was less than the actual price which we were not aware of until we paid. The excuse was that the person who made the booking was new!
reviews.title: Basic

reviews.text: If you visit this hotel, make sure that you check their price list before you order anything.
reviews.title: Christmas drinks rip-off

reviews.text: I recently paid a visit with a group of friends. I ordered two drinks, a pint of bitter and a glass of mulled wine. When the the barman said that will be £8, I thought I'd miss-heard.
reviews.title: Above the pub

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice rooms above a gastro pub in a great location near Kew and Richmond. Substantial English breakfast served.
reviews.title: good west london location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice room, with lovely modern decor. Breakfast was great and chap serving was very helpful.
reviews.title: Nice hotel very unfriendly receptionist.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Negatives:- Manager was on reception when we arrrived and she is a very unfriendly lady, room needed a little more cleaning and shower took quite a while to heat up, but having said all that was better than so many places we have stayed.
reviews.title: Go somewhere else!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the "Fuschia" room which seemed as though it was a single room with a double bed in it. Very small - the wardrobe contained tea/coffee making facilities but there was insufficient room to fully open the door - the wardrobe also had only 3 coat hangers in it. Difficult for 2 people to move around the room as it was so small.
reviews.title: Great local for food and drink

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Many stairs leading to the room and also in the room and stair carpet in poor condition. Very poorly furnished and dusty, the washbasin tap in danger of falling off and no hot water in the evening or following morning.
reviews.title: Over priced, noisy at night, poor quality breakfasts, lousy uncaring staff

aka: The Inn At Kew Gardens (Kew Gardens Hotel) Hotel
